name: Quincy
overview: Quincy is Yahtzi by another name, basically a live-dice game that resembles Poker Dice except that the dice are traditionally engraved with dots 1 to 6. Severn's version is probably the best, with clear on-screen instructions as to the complexities of play (which are numerous) 2 to 6 players may take part with individual screen cards to keep score.
